## Posterior

수식은 LaTeX로 표기합니다:

$$
p(\theta \mid y) \propto p(y \mid \theta) p(\theta).
$$


::: {.cell}

```{.python .cell-code}
import numpy as np
np.random.seed(0)
data = np.random.normal(0, 1, 10)
float(np.mean(data))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
0.7380231707288347
```


:::
:::



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(1)
mean(rnorm(10))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 0.1322028
```


:::
:::
